snippet.title: SiN: Gold - Nightdive Studios Trailer
snippet.description:
Now Available on Steam, and GOG!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1313

GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/sin_gold

Now includes Wages of Sin expansion pack!

When the CEO of SinTEK Industries begins injecting the streets with a DNA-altering drug, it's time to reassess the laws of morality. When the same twisted bio-chemist plans to overtake the world with her unholy army of genetically-engineered mutants, it's time to rewrite the golden rule.

-------------------------------------------------------------------
http://www.nightdivestudios.com
https://discord.gg/AKBNqzH
https://www.facebook.com/NightdiveStudios
https://twitter.com/nightdivestudio
